data.title: Greg Knox - 2024 - Football
data.meta_description:
Greg Knox (79) Offensive Line  - High School:
• 1st Team LSWA Class 4A All-State… 3-Time 1st Team 3-4A All-District… 1st Team All-CENLA… Blue-Grey All-American
data.text:
High School:

• 1st Team LSWA Class 4A All-State… 3-Time 1st Team 3-4A All-District… 1st Team All-CENLA… Blue-Grey All-American Bowl… One of the top offensive linemen in the state and ranked as the 5th-best OL prospect in the state by Dandy Don website… Played a critical part in producing one of the top running backs in the state who rushed for over 2,100 yards and scored 23 touchdowns… Allowed just four sacks in his career… also offered by Southeastern and Grambling.

Personal:

• Born September 14, 2004… Son of Greg Knox Jr. and Tammy Knox… One sibling – Takeera Davis… Started playing football when he was 7-years-old… Likes to cook.
